      • gameMapReading

        public java.lang.String gameMapReading​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continents> continents,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Countries> countries,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> boundries,
                                       java.lang.String fileName)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will read the uploaded file
        Parameters:
        continents - contains the information about continents
        countries - contains the information about countries
        boundries - contains the adjency list of countries
        fileName - it is map file which is read
        Returns:
        success if map is loaded successfully else failure
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
